kv8.2:1.15: Kāmabhavassa ca rūpabhavassa ca antare atthi antarābhavoti?
kv8.2:1.19: Rūpabhavassa ca arūpabhavassa ca antare atthi antarābhavoti?
kv8.2:2.1: Kāmabhavassa ca rūpabhavassa ca antare natthi antarābhavoti?
kv8.2:2.3: Hañci kāmabhavassa ca rūpabhavassa ca antare natthi antarābhavo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv8.2:2.5: Rūpabhavassa ca arūpabhavassa ca antare natthi antarābhavoti?
kv8.2:2.7: Hañci rūpabhavassa ca arūpabhavassa ca antare natthi antarābhavo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv8.2:3.3: Pañcamī sā yoni, chaṭṭhamī sā gati, aṭṭhamī sā viññāṇaṭṭhiti, dasamo so sattāvāsoti?
kv8.2:3.7: Antarābhavo bhavo gati sattāvāso saṁsāro yoni viññāṇaṭṭhiti attabhāvapaṭilābhoti?
kv8.2:3.13: antarābhave sattā jāyanti jīyanti mīyanti cavanti upapajjantīti?
kv8.2:3.15: antarābhave atthi rūpaṁ vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇanti?
kv8.2:4.1: Atthi kāmabhavo, kāmabhavo bhavo gati sattāvāso saṁsāro yoni viññāṇaṭṭhiti attabhāvapaṭilābhoti?
kv8.2:4.3: Atthi antarābhavo, antarābhavo bhavo gati sattāvāso saṁsāro yoni viññāṇaṭṭhiti attabhāvapaṭilābhoti?
kv8.2:4.13: kāmabhave sattā jāyanti jīyanti mīyanti cavanti upapajjantīti?
kv8.2:4.15: Antarābhave sattā jāyanti jīyanti mīyanti cavanti upapajjantīti?
kv8.2:4.17: kāmabhave atthi rūpaṁ vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇanti?
kv8.2:4.19: Antarābhave atthi rūpaṁ vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇanti?
kv8.2:5.1: Atthi rūpabhavo, rūpabhavo bhavo gati sattāvāso saṁsāro yoni viññāṇaṭṭhiti attabhāvapaṭilābhoti?
kv8.2:5.3: Atthi antarābhavo, antarābhavo bhavo gati sattāvāso saṁsāro yoni viññāṇaṭṭhiti attabhāvapaṭilābhoti?
kv8.2:5.13: rūpabhave sattā jāyanti jīyanti mīyanti cavanti upapajjantīti?
kv8.2:5.15: Antarābhave sattā jāyanti jīyanti mīyanti cavanti upapajjantīti?
kv8.2:5.17: rūpabhave atthi rūpaṁ vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇanti?
kv8.2:5.19: Antarābhave atthi rūpaṁ vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇanti?
kv8.2:6.1: Atthi arūpabhavo, arūpabhavo bhavo gati sattāvāso saṁsāro yoni viññāṇaṭṭhiti attabhāvapaṭilābhoti?
kv8.2:6.3: Atthi antarābhavo, antarābhavo bhavo gati sattāvāso saṁsāro yoni viññāṇaṭṭhiti attabhāvapaṭilābhoti?
kv8.2:6.13: arūpabhave sattā jāyanti jīyanti mīyanti cavanti upapajjantīti?
kv8.2:6.15: Antarābhave sattā jāyanti jīyanti mīyanti cavanti upapajjantīti?
kv8.2:6.17: arūpabhave atthi vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇanti?
kv8.2:6.19: Antarābhave atthi vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇanti?
kv8.2:7.7: Hañci sabbesaññeva sattānaṁ natthi antarābhavo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv8.2:8.7: Hañci ānantariyassa puggalassa natthi antarābhavo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv8.2:9.15: Hañci arūpūpagassa puggalassa natthi antarābhavo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv8.2:11.5: Hañci antarāparinibbāyī puggalo atthi, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv8.2:12.1: Antarāparinibbāyī puggalo atthīti katvā atthi antarābhavoti?
kv8.2:12.3: Upahaccaparinibbāyī puggalo atthīti katvā atthi upahaccabhavoti?
kv8.2:12.5: antarāparinibbāyī puggalo atthīti katvā atthi antarābhavoti?
kv8.2:12.8: sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī puggalo atthīti katvā atthi sasaṅkhārabhavoti?
